title: AD/Mid laner LFT for Oceanic Open Ladder.
body:
Hey guys, my name is Josh and I'm looking for a team to play in for the Oceanic open ladder. I can play mid or AD, can also play jungle but prefer the other two roles. I just got back from holidays and will be playing a hell of a lot of solo (maybe duo) queue to improve myself as a player all round. I'm not going to sit here and say I'm better than my rank, because I'm not, but I'm going to try my best to be. 

If you're interested in trialing me, add me in game and we can talk. I have skype and teamspeak and can download any other VOIP required. Thanks!

IGN: lKakao (Yes, that's an L.)

replies.body:
Ign: proxinzhaoplayer
Age:16
Roles pefer anything but jungle
Rank: silver 4 
Message me through here
 On this forum
Thank you
